entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
